functions.name: k8s_pod_automatic_update_check
functions.description: Checks if automatic pod updates are configured for k8s_apps.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_APPS API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_APPS is a Kubernetes component for application management.
Configuration, security, monitoring, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
